resources.string: We have plenty of spinner bikes to match all your indoor road-biking needs. You can even take spinner classes taught by pro-bikers.
Our weight equipment is state of the art and will surely leave you tired. Just make sure to ask for help if you don\'t know how to use something!
The cleaning staff sprays the entire gym down every night with chemicals that kill just about all bacteria, viruses, etc. We take cleaning seriously.
The rock-climbing wall features routes from beginner to expert. You can purchase a day pass or pay by the hour!
